quote: Things turn out best for the people who make the best of the way things turn out. – John Wooden
fact: The only two days of the year in which there are no professional sports games--MLB, NBA, NHL, or NFL--are the day before and the day after the Major League All-Star Game.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: Two fish are in a tank, one turns to the other and says, "how do you drive this thing?"
